item.title: 印度央行出人意料的举措释放出矛盾信号
item.description: 印度央行在新行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）的领导下，在采取积极措施刺激经济增长和贷款的同时，也向市场参与者发出了相互矛盾的货币政策信号。【原文：India’s central bank under new Governor Sanjay Malhotra is giving market participants conflicting signals about monetary policy as it takes aggressive steps to spur economic growth and lending.】

item.title: 英伟达和三星计划投资机器人初创公司 Skild AI
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.）和英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）将持有 Skild AI 公司的少数股份，以加强它们在新兴消费机器人行业的工作。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. and Nvidia Corp. will take minority stakes in Skild AI Inc. as they seek to bolster their work in the emerging consumer robotics industry.】

item.title: 橡树树的马克斯说特朗普重视不可预测性，请谨慎行事
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management LP）联合创始人霍华德-马克斯（Howard Marks）表示，投资者应预计美国总统唐纳德-特朗普执政期间将持续存在不确定性，而全球市场相对较高的估值也要求投资者持谨慎态度。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management LP co-founder Howard Marks said investors should expect uncertainty to endure under US President Donald Trump and relatively high valuations in global markets require a cautious stance.】

item.title: 黄金因中东紧张局势和特朗普关税承诺而上涨
item.description: 由于中东紧张局势加剧，黄金连续第二天上涨，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将在两周内向贸易伙伴通报关税税率，这也支持了黄金的避风港地位。【原文：Gold gained for a second day on increased tensions in the Middle East, with its haven status also supported by President Donald Trump’s comments that he will inform trading partners on tariff rates within two weeks.】

item.title: 即使收益率创历史新低，资金仍大量涌入东南亚债券市场
item.description: 尽管东南亚主权债券的收益率创下了历史新低，但投资者仍对这些债券趋之若鹜，原因是投资者远离美国资产，并押注该地区将进一步降息。【原文：Investors are making a beeline for Southeast Asian sovereign bonds despite their record low yields amid a shift away from US assets and on bets for further interest-rate cuts in the region.】

item.title: 亚洲物价下跌为降息和美国经济分化铺平道路
item.description: 随着食品和燃料价格下降以及当地货币对美元汇率走强推低了成本，整个亚洲的通胀正在放缓。在美国关税风险和相关不确定性对前景造成压力的情况下，这为该地区的央行行长们提供了支持其依赖贸易的经济体的空间。【原文：Inflation is easing across Asia as lower food and fuel prices and stronger local currencies against the dollar push down costs. That’s giving the region’s central bank chiefs scope to support their trade-reliant economies as the risk of US tariffs and related uncertainty weigh on the outlook.】

item.title: 日本 6 月信贷销售创下多年来最繁忙纪录，买家纷纷寻求风险投资
item.description: 日本借款人在 6 月份售出的公司债券数量已经超过了 4 年来任何一个 6 月份的售出量，而本月还未过半。【原文：Japanese borrowers have already sold more corporate bonds than they have for any June in four years, and the month isn’t even halfway through.】

item.title: 特朗普再次表示将在两周内制定单边关税措施
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他打算在未来一到两周内致函贸易伙伴，在7月9日对数十个经济体重新征收更高关税的最后期限到来之前，确定单边关税税率。【原文：President Donald Trump said he intended to send letters to trading partners in the next one to two weeks setting unilateral tariff rates, ahead of a July 9 deadline to reimpose higher duties on dozens of economies.】

item.title: 市场降温，英国房价指标降至 10 个月低点
item.description: 备受关注的英国房地产价格指数跌至近一年来的最低点，表明在购房者减税政策到期后，房地产市场仍面临压力。【原文：A closely watched index of UK property prices declined to its lowest in almost a year, suggesting the housing market remains under pressure after a tax break for buyers expired.】

item.title: Chime 和支持者在首次公开募股中筹集到 8.64 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Chime Financial Inc. 及其部分股东将在首次公开募股中筹资 8.64 亿美元，股票定价高于市场范围。【原文：Chime Financial Inc. and some of its shareholders are raising $864 million in an initial public offering, pricing the shares above a marketed range, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势引发原油暴涨，股市平开：市场综述
item.description: 中东紧张局势导致原油跳涨，亚洲股市周四谨慎开盘，投资者等待中美贸易协议的进一步细节。【原文：Oil jumped on tensions in the Middle East and Asian stocks are poised for a cautious open Thursday as investors awaited further details on a US-China trade accord.】

item.title: 阿达尼计划机场部门 2027 年上市，加快 1000 亿美元的资本支出
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的集团正准备在 2027 年之前将其机场部门上市，这是一项雄心勃勃的发展计划的一部分，该计划要求在未来几年内投资 1000 亿美元用于各项业务。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s group is gearing up to list its airports unit by 2027, as part of an ambitious growth plan that entails investing $100 billion across businesses over the next few years.】

item.title: 美国从中东撤出部分使馆人员，石油价格继续上涨
item.description: 在安全风险上升的情况下，美国下令部分工作人员离开其驻巴格达大使馆，并允许军人家属离开中东后，石油延续了自10月份以来的最大单日涨幅。【原文：Oil extended its biggest daily gain since October after the US ordered some staff to depart its embassy in Baghdad and allowed military service members’ families to leave the Middle East amid rising security risks.】

item.title: 美国能源部长称 2026 年石油产量下降 "不太可能
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特说，美国明年的石油产量 "不太可能 "下降，这与一家政府机构本周发布的预期相反。【原文：US Energy Secretary Chris Wright said it’s “unlikely” that the country’s oil production will drop next year, contrary to the expectations released this week by a government agency.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟称将提前解决回购和同意征集问题
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. intends to exercise its right to settle its bond buyback and consent solicitation early, on June 30, for investors that have agreed to sell some of their bonds to the company and change covenants on the other securities, according to a company filing.】

item.title: 艾芬豪重启受洪水影响的部分刚果铜矿
item.description: 艾芬豪矿业有限公司（Ivanhoe Mines Ltd.）已重新启动其位于刚果民主共和国的巨型铜矿的部分地下作业，而另一部分在地震活动造成地下深处洪水泛滥后仍处于停产状态。【原文：Ivanhoe Mines Ltd. has restarted underground operations in part of its giant copper mine in the Democratic Republic of Congo while another section remains offline after seismic activity caused flooding deep below ground.】

item.title: 跨山公司希望在 2027 年初增加管道容量
item.description: 跨山输油管道由政府拥有，该公司的最高负责人表示，到 2027 年初，该输油管道每天可多输送 75,000 桶原油，这有可能帮助加拿大石油生产商扩大向非美国市场的运输。【原文：The Trans Mountain pipeline could handle an additional 75,000 barrels of crude a day by a early 2027, the government-owned company’s top executive said, potentially helping Canadian oil producers expand shipments to non-US markets.】

item.title: 顶级肉类加工商 JBS 推迟开始纽约交易
item.description: 根据一份监管文件，全球最大的肉类生产商 JBS NV 已将其股票在纽约的交易开始时间推迟一天。【原文：JBS NV, the world’s largest meat producer, has delayed the start of trading of its shares in New York by one day, according to a regulatory filing.】

item.title: 查诺斯回击战略公司的赛勒，称其为 "推销员
item.description: 著名做空者吉姆-查诺斯（Jim Chanos）谴责《战略》杂志的迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）使用误导性模型对其加密货币公司进行估值，并再次强调他建议做空其股票，转而买入比特币。【原文：Famed short-seller Jim Chanos denounced Strategy’s Michael Saylor for using a misleading model to value his crypto-treasury firm and reemphasized his recommendation to short its shares and buy Bitcoin instead.】

item.title: 中国银行和摩根大通是参与阿根廷 20 亿美元回购的银行之一
item.description: 阿根廷与七家私人银行就 20 亿美元的回购协议达成了协议，这笔资金旨在增加阿根廷中央银行的外汇储备。【原文：Argentina launched an agreement with seven private banks on a repurchase agreement of $2 billion, money aimed at bolstering the central bank’s foreign reserves.】

item.title: 惠誉认为北美企业前景恶化
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将北美非金融企业2025年的前景展望从 "中性 "调整为 "恶化"，预计高关税将刺激通胀，削弱消费者的消费能力。【原文：Fitch Ratings revised its 2025 outlook on North American non-financial firms to “deteriorating” from “neutral,” expecting high tariffs to stoke inflation and dampen consumers’ ability to spend.】

item.title: 巴西法官得出结论：社交媒体公司应对帖子负责
item.description: 巴西最高法院多数支持进一步监管社交媒体公司，这是当局为追究科技巨头对其平台上发布的非法内容的责任而做出的最新努力。【原文：Brazil’s Supreme Court formed a majority in favor of further regulating social media companies, the latest effort by authorities to hold tech giants accountable for illegal content posted on their platforms.】

item.title: 新西兰央行决策者闭门谈话引发透明度担忧
item.description: 新西兰储备银行货币政策委员会的一位外部成员今天将罕见地发表演讲，但这将是闭门演讲。【原文：An external member of the Reserve Bank of New Zealand’s Monetary Policy Committee will give a rare presentation today, but it will be behind closed doors.】

item.title: 核电初创企业 Oklo 将发行股票筹资 4 亿美元
item.description: 开发小型反应堆的核能初创公司 Oklo Inc.【原文：Oklo Inc., a nuclear energy startup developing small reactors, is seeking to raise as much as $400 million in a secondary share offering.】

item.title: 贝森特认为 2 万亿美元的美元稳定币市场是合理的
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，与美元挂钩的稳定币可能达到 2 万亿美元甚至更高，他重申了这些数字资产加强美元在全球金融体系中地位的潜力。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said that dollar-linked stablecoins could hit $2 trillion or even more as he reiterated the potential for these digital assets to strengthen the greenback’s position in the global financial system.】

item.title: 为什么中国等得起达成协议，而美国却等不起？
item.description:
在本期特朗普经济学节目中，我们将讨论华盛顿与北京的贸易战谈判现状，以及为什么习近平仍占上风。【原文：

On this episode of Trumponomics, we discuss the status of Washington’s trade war negotiations with Beijing, and why Xi Jinping still has the upper hand.

】

item.title: 特朗普废除污染规则为新建脏工厂铺平道路
item.description: 特朗普政府计划废除发电厂污染强制规定，这将使公用事业公司更容易、更便宜地建造新的化石燃料发电厂，同时阻碍对清洁能源的投资。【原文：The Trump administration’s plan to repeal power-plant pollution mandates will make it easier and cheaper for utilities to build new fossil fuel-fired plants, while stalling investment in clean energy.】

item.title: 甲骨文预计年度云计算增长强劲，势头强劲
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp.）预计，在本月开始的财年中，云基础设施的销售额将跃升70%以上，从而提振了投资者对这一备受关注的业务的热情。【原文：Oracle Corp. projected cloud infrastructure sales will jump more than 70% in the fiscal year that began this month, boosting investor enthusiasm for the closely watched business.】

item.title: 迪勒的 IAC 公司就 Match.com 剥离案达成 3,000 万美元和解协议
item.description: 巴里-迪勒（Barry Diller）的 IAC 公司同意支付 3,000 万美元和解金，以解决投资者对其分拆 Match Group Inc.【原文：Barry Diller’s IAC agreed to a $30 million settlement to resolve claims that investors were shortchanged in its spinoff of Match Group Inc., which operates dating apps including Tinder and Hinge.】

item.title: 先锋寻求美国证券交易委员会批准扩展减税基金设计
item.description: 以低成本指数基金而闻名的投资巨头先锋集团（Vanguard Group Inc.【原文：Vanguard Group Inc., the investment giant famous for low-cost index funds, is seeking regulatory approval to expand its signature tax-saving fund structure — as anticipation grows that the Securities and Exchange Commission under Paul Atkins will soon embrace the design en masse.】
